Hi All,

Offers Welcome

I have three raw Old Mill cards for sale. These three were from a large collection found in Texas a few years back.  The cut on them looks very similar and I love the large top borders.  

Stanage
Hoblitzell 
Scott

Above 3 have SOLD

I also have these two SGC1 OMSLs: Lafitte & Miller

Both have SOLD

Prices assume PPFF and include shipping in bubble mailer with tracking. Much Thanks,

Colton
Email sent on both Lafitte and Miller
